meanings.definition: The fact or circumstance of being born
meanings.sent1: The nativities of all living beings are unique and special.
meanings.sent2: Learning about different nativities helps us understand diversity.
meanings.sent3: The nativities of twins can sometimes cause confusion for others.
meanings.sent4: In nature, the nativities of animals are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent5: The nativities of stars and galaxies are a mystery scientists are eager to solve.

meanings.definition: The place or circumstances of a person's birth
meanings.sent1: She visited the hospital to see the nativities of the newborn babies.
meanings.sent2: Exploring one's own nativities can provide insight into their identity.
meanings.sent3: The nativities of historical figures often shape their future actions.
meanings.sent4: The nativities of famous leaders can influence the course of history.
meanings.sent5: The nativities of famous landmarks attract tourists from around the world.

meanings.definition: The birth of Jesus Christ, celebrated on December 25th
meanings.sent1: During Christmas, many families set up nativities in their homes.
meanings.sent2: The nativities in churches depict the story of Jesus' birth.
meanings.sent3: Children enjoy reenacting the nativities in school plays.
meanings.sent4: The nativities displayed in town squares bring a festive spirit.
meanings.sent5: The nativities remind us of the true meaning of Christmas.
